name: Plain Valley Ski Trails
description: Plain Valley Ski Trails (PVST) is a thriving cross-country ski community. With the collaboration of generous landowners, PVST works to create and sustain a high-quality ski trail system that serves the community, while also funding barrier-free ski educational programs that motivate individual and team achievement. To support our youth, please consider becoming a monthly donor or making a one-time gift. Visit www.SkiPlain.com/donate.
